content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, thank you for taking the time to come and see the apartment. I believe you will find it to be a great living space, given its location and amenities. How much are you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I don't have a lot of money. I was thinking about 300 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euro per month is much lower than my expectations for this apartment. It's a brand new property in the city center, and I believe it's worth more. How about 500 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big difference. I don't have that much money. I could do 420 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 420 Euro per month is closer to my asking price, it's still not quite what I'm looking for. This apartment is in high demand due to its central location, and I'm sure there are other tenants who would be willing to pay more. How about we meet in the middle at 450 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that. We have a deal at 450 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
